detectors.description:
allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#21)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#23)
	- SBUT.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#99-103)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#24)
	- SBUT.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#146-148)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- SBUT.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#95-97)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#26)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#27)
	- SBUT.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SBUT.sol#124-144)
